original: Hallbeck, Astrid Charlotta Ingeborg, läroverksadjunkt, Växjö, f. 18/ 7/99 i Hörby, Malmöh. 1., av rektor Gust. H. o. Ida Nilsson. — Stud:ex. i Lund 18, folksk :lär :ex. i Kalmar 20, fik kand. i Lund 25, fil. mag. 26, ef-terprövn. 28, provår i Sthlm 28. Re,s. t. Tvskl. 22, 23, 28, 30, 35 o. 36, Engl. 27, 32 o. 37, Schv^eiz 31 o. 39, Frankr. 33 o. 34, Österr. 38. E. o. lär. i Hörby 18-19 o. 20-22, folksk :lär. kort. period. i Kristianstad, Lund o. Hörby 25-26, e. o. lär. v. Hälisingborgs h. foilk-sk. 27, v. Gbgs komm. mellansk. 29- 30, ord. ämneslär. i Katrineholm 29, adj. i moder sm. o. tyska v. Växjö h. a. 1. ,sed. 38.
translated: Hallbeck, Astrid Charlotta Ingeborg, high school teacher, Växjö, b. 18/7/99 in Hörby, Malmöhus County, daughter of principal Gust. H. and Ida Nilsson. — Passed high school exam in Lund 1918, elementary school teacher exam in Kalmar 1920, Bachelor of Arts in Lund 1925, Master of Arts 1926, reviewed in 1928, probationary year in Stockholm 1928. Traveled to Germany in 1922, 1923, 1928, 1930, 1935, and 1936, to England in 1927, 1932, and 1937, to Switzerland in 1931 and 1939, to France in 1933 and 1934, and to Austria in 1938. Substitute teacher in Hörby in 1918-1919 and 1920-1922, elementary school teacher for a short period in Kristianstad, Lund, and Hörby in 1925-1926, substitute teacher at Helsingborg's upper elementary school in 1927, teacher at Gothenburg's public middle school in 1929-1930, subject teacher in Katrineholm in 1929, and high school adjunct (Swedish and German) in Växjö from 1938.
